item.title: The Phoenician Maidens by Euripides
item.description: Play by Euripides. It is in GB Volume 5. Newsletter post: www.readgreatbooks.info/p/great-books-ep-90-euripides-the-phoenician People in the play: Jocasta, Antigone, Old Retainer, Chorus of Phoenician Maidens, Polynices, Eteocles, Creon, Teiresias, Menceceus, First Messenger, Second Messenger, Oedipus The Phoenician Maidens Metadata Author: Euripides Full Title: The Phoenician Maidens Category:articles URL: readwise.io/reader/document_raw_content/237461649 Highlights Now the race of women by nature loves scandal; and if they get some slight handle for their gossip they exaggerate it, for they seem to take a pleasure in saying everything bad of one another.
